mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_status=1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_IMG, BOARD_WRITER, MEMBER_ID, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER_TBL ON (BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY 1 DESC)B) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
